blogs.title: Good Day Today
blogs.author: Jake S.
blogs.text: Today was unlike any other. Learned a lot at Epicodus on Day One. Like, how to use git commands, and how to manipulate and create a web site using HTML. Challenging, but a lot of Fun!

blogs.title: Day 2
blogs.author: Jake S.
blogs.text: What a good day today. Second day of coding class. pretty crazy.

blogs.title: Third Day
blogs.author: Jake S.
blogs.text: The third day was pretty rough...not of a fan of Git requests.... :(

comments.text: This was a fun one to read.
comments.author: Jake S
